name: AMGT
description:
AMGT Terrain Generator

A peaceful little toy that generates procedual terrain in real time. In the style of an autumnal mountain. 

Controls: RGenerate Terrain
FToggle Fullscreen
Made with:

The farm tileset by Kenney.nl:

Impact sounds by Kenney.nl:
